entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProgressMessageHandler fires too often and cannot be configured #52616
  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultInboundClaimTypeMap.Clear() no longer effective in .NET 8 #52615
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #52612
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52611
  • Identity pages cannot be reached after migrating Blazor server from 7 to 8 #52610
  • Reading an XML document from a MultipartReader only works with an intermediate StreamReader #52607
  • Make TUser nullable on IPasswordValidator.ValidateAsync #52606
  • Net7 Blazor + WebAssembly (Client + Server) + SignalR | Hot reload fail #52605
  • Out of the box .net 8 blazor project fails when navigating directly to a route that load a page with injected dependencies. #52614
  • After update from .net6 to .net8 - first time CheckPasswordAsync will cause an exception if user is loaded with AsNoTracking #52602
  • Blank page and no error when injecting undefined service in InteractiveServer #52598
  • .Net 8 Blazor Web hot reload not working #52596

Closed

  • While performing Authorization Http client call not working #34025
    Planning: WebUI
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #50850
    Discussions
  • Hot Reload not working: Cannot update because an inferred delegate type has changed. #52270
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52600
  • Browser hangs when @layout is specified in _Imports file in child folder (Blazor-WASM) #52593
  • Blazor Component Library with www styles, the stylesheets cannot be accessed asp.net app via link tag #52594
  • .NET 8 Blazor WebApp hangs when toggling between pages #52591
  • .NET 8 Blazor Interactive Auto Mode Connection Priority #52597
  • InvalidOperationException: The authentication handler registered for scheme 'bearer' is 'JwtBearerHandler' which cannot be used for SignInAsync #52151
  • Support `google.type.Decimal` in gRPC JSON transcoding #51520
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52585

PullRequests

Created

  • redis force-reconnect; fix release failure scenario #52608
    feature-caching, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Make user in ValidateAsync nullable #52604
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • fix version typo #52601
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • HeaderDictionaryTypeExtensions not using Dictionary #52551
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add HTTP Gone (410) result #52377
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52559
    area-blazor
